text: (Allāh) mikap paricuttamāṉavaṉ; avaṉ taṉ aṭiyārai paittul harāmiliruntu (kaḥpattullāhviliruntu tolaivilirukkum paittul mukattasiluḷḷa) masjitul aksāviṟku ōriravil aḻaittuc ceṉṟāṉ; (masjitul aksāviṉ) cuṟṟellaikaḷai nām apivirutti ceytirukkiṉṟōm; nam'muṭaiya attāṭcikaḷai avarukkuk kāṇpippataṟkāka (avvāṟu aḻaittuc ceṉṟōm); niccayamāka avaṉ (yāvaṟṟaiyum) ceviyuṟuvōṉākavum; pārppōṉākavum irukkiṉṟāṉ
